title: Patrick Lefevere Walks Back ‘Parties Too Much, Drinks Too Much’ Comments on Julian Alaphilippe
content:
Soudal Quick-Step boss in media firestorm after Belgian magazine prints interview, drawing ire from Marion Rousse: 'Please show more respect and … class.'

Read the full article at Patrick Lefevere Walks Back ‘Parties Too Much, Drinks Too Much’ Comments on Julian Alaphilippe on Velo.
author: ahood
